https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null This voyage of discovery through Rajasthan, Mali and Ladakh contains three songs, three stories and myriad timeless wisdom. A dynamic film based on oral tales, with lovely characters, which celebrates the narrative art form and the type of human simplicity that offers sound advice for our everyday lives. Bardsongs
